function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Optimizing hyperparameters using Grid Search","Impact":"Poor hyperparameter optimization may lead to suboptimal performance and inaccurate classification.","Mitigation":"Use cross-validation and iterative testing to identify the best hyperparameters for the model.","Technologies":"Grid Search, cross-validation, iterative testing","People":"Data scientists, machine learning researchers","Owner":"Data science team"},{"Description":"Evaluation of LDA models","Impact":"Inaccurate evaluation may lead to misleading conclusions about the effectiveness of the model.","Mitigation":"Use diverse evaluation metrics, including document classification, coherence score, and perplexity, to comprehensively assess the model's performance.","Technologies":"LDA evaluation metrics, evaluation libraries","People":"Machine learning researchers, topic modeling experts","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Visualization of LDA algorithm output using PyLDAvis","Impact":"Inaccurate visualization may lead to misinterpretation of the model's results and findings.","Mitigation":"Ensure proper data preprocessing and visualization parameter tuning to accurately represent the LDA model output.","Technologies":"PyLDAvis, data visualization tools","People":"Data scientists, visualization experts","Owner":"Data science and visualization teams"}]}
